result.eng: Are you leaving already?
result.ga: An bhfuil sibh ag imeacht cheana féin
result.orig: An bhfuil sibh ag imeacht cheana féin
result.html: An bhfuil sibh ag imeacht cheana féinAre you leaving already?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil siḃ ag imeaċt ċeana féinAre you leaving already?

result.eng: We missed the first train.
result.ga: D'imigh an chéad traein orainn
result.orig: D'imigh an chéad traein orainn
result.html: D'imigh an chéad traein orainnWe missed the first train.
result.ponchtml: D'imiġ an ċéad traein orainnWe missed the first train.

result.eng: Is that the woman who left you?
result.ga: An í sin an bhean a d'imigh uait
result.orig: An í sin an bhean a d'imigh uait
result.html: An í sin an bhean a d'imigh uaitIs that the woman who left you?
result.ponchtml: An í sin an ḃean a d'imiġ uaitIs that the woman who left you?

result.eng: When he was leaving, Fionn said he would be back.
result.ga: Ar imeacht dó dúirt Fionn go mbeadh sé ar ais
result.orig: Ar imeacht dó dúirt Fionn go mbeadh sé ar ais
result.html: Ar imeacht dó dúirt Fionn go mbeadh sé ar aisWhen he was leaving, Fionn said he would be back.
result.ponchtml: Ar imeaċt dó dúirt Fionn go mbeaḋ sé ar aisWhen he was leaving, Fionn said he would be back.

result.eng: I should leave now.
result.ga: Ba cheart dom imeacht anois
result.orig: Ba cheart dom imeacht anois
result.html: Ba cheart dom imeacht anoisI should leave now.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċeart dom imeaċt anoisI should leave now.

result.eng: I should leave now.
result.ga: Ba chóir dom imeacht anois
result.orig: Ba chóir dom imeacht anois
result.html: Ba chóir dom imeacht anoisI should leave now.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċóir dom imeaċt anoisI should leave now.

result.eng: He threw on his uniform and left.
result.ga: Bhuail sé a éide uime agus d'imigh
result.orig: Bhuail sé a éide uime agus d'imigh
result.html: Bhuail sé a éide uime agus d'imighHe threw on his uniform and left.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail sé a éide uime agus d'imiġHe threw on his uniform and left.

result.eng: My money was leaving me fast.
result.ga: Bhí mo chuid airgid ag imeacht uaim go mear
result.orig: Bhí mo chuid airgid ag imeacht uaim go mear
result.html: Bhí mo chuid airgid ag imeacht uaim go mearMy money was leaving me fast.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mo ċuid airgid ag imeaċt uaim go mearMy money was leaving me fast.

result.eng: I didn't know whether I should stay or go.
result.ga: Bhí mé idir dhá chomhairle ar chóir dom fanacht nó imeacht
result.orig: Bhí mé idir dhá chomhairle ar chóir dom fanacht nó imeacht
result.html: Bhí mé idir dhá chomhairle ar chóir dom fanacht nó imeachtI didn't know whether I should stay or go.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé idir ḋá ċoṁairle ar ċóir dom fanaċt nó imeaċtI didn't know whether I should stay or go.

result.eng: I have to go now.
result.ga: Caithfidh mé imeacht anois
result.orig: Caithfidh mé imeacht anois
result.html: Caithfidh mé imeacht anoisI have to go now.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ mé imeaċt anoisI have to go now.

result.eng: Put it in the boot and we'll go.
result.ga: Cuir sa chófra é go n-imeoidh muid
result.orig: Cuir sa chófra é go n-imeoidh muid
result.html: Cuir sa chófra é go n-imeoidh muidPut it in the boot and we'll go.
result.ponchtml: Cuir sa ċófra é go n-imeoiḋ muidPut it in the boot and we'll go.

result.eng: Where did he go?
result.ga: Cár imigh sé
result.orig: Cár imigh sé
result.html: Cár imigh séWhere did he go?
result.ponchtml: Cár imiġ séWhere did he go?

result.eng: I said goodbye to my mother and left.
result.ga: D'fhág mé slán ag mo mháthair agus d'imigh mé
result.orig: D'fhág mé slán ag mo mháthair agus d'imigh mé
result.html: D'fhág mé slán ag mo mháthair agus d'imigh méI said goodbye to my mother and left.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág mé slán ag mo ṁáṫair agus d'imiġ méI said goodbye to my mother and left.

result.eng: They left without me.
result.ga: D'imigh siad gan mé
result.orig: D'imigh siad gan mé
result.html: D'imigh siad gan méThey left without me.
result.ponchtml: D'imiġ siad gan méThey left without me.

result.eng: He left Ireland.
result.ga: D'imigh sé as Éirinn
result.orig: D'imigh sé as Éirinn
result.html: D'imigh sé as ÉirinnHe left Ireland.
result.ponchtml: D'imiġ sé as ÉirinnHe left Ireland.

result.eng: She left like the wind.
result.ga: D'imigh sí ar nós na gaoithe
result.orig: D'imigh sí ar nós na gaoithe
result.html: D'imigh sí ar nós na gaoitheShe left like the wind.
result.ponchtml: D'imiġ sí ar nós na gaoiṫeShe left like the wind.

result.eng: Hurry up, the train is about to leave!
result.ga: Déan deifir tá an traein ar tí imeacht
result.orig: Déan deifir tá an traein ar tí imeacht
result.html: Déan deifir tá an traein ar tí imeachtHurry up, the train is about to leave!
result.ponchtml: Déan deifir tá an traein ar tí imeaċtHurry up, the train is about to leave!

result.eng: I told her to leave.
result.ga: Dúirt mé léi imeacht
result.orig: Dúirt mé léi imeacht
result.html: Dúirt mé léi imeachtI told her to leave.
result.ponchtml: Dúirt mé léi imeaċtI told her to leave.

result.eng: I think the train is about to leave.
result.ga: Is dóigh liom go bhfuil an traein ar tí imeacht
result.orig: Is dóigh liom go bhfuil an traein ar tí imeacht
result.html: Is dóigh liom go bhfuil an traein ar tí imeachtI think the train is about to leave.
result.ponchtml: Is dóiġ liom go ḃfuil an traein ar tí imeaċtI think the train is about to leave.

result.eng: Let me leave!
result.ga: Lig dom imeacht
result.orig: Lig dom imeacht
result.html: Lig dom imeachtLet me leave!
result.ponchtml: Lig dom imeaċtLet me leave!

result.eng: Don't leave yet!
result.ga: Ná himigh go fóill
result.orig: Ná himigh go fóill
result.html: Ná himigh go fóillDon't leave yet!
result.ponchtml: Ná himiġ go fóillDon't leave yet!

result.eng: Don't stand here, off you go!
result.ga: Ná seas anseo imigh leat
result.orig: Ná seas anseo imigh leat
result.html: Ná seas anseo imigh leatDon't stand here, off you go!
result.ponchtml: Ná seas anseo imiġ leatDon't stand here, off you go!

result.eng: Good-bye, Patrick, I have to go.
result.ga: Slán agat a Phádraig caithfidh mé imeacht
result.orig: Slán agat a Phádraig caithfidh mé imeacht
result.html: Slán agat a Phádraig caithfidh mé imeachtGood-bye, Patrick, I have to go.
result.ponchtml: Slán agat a Ṗádraig caiṫfiḋ mé imeaċtGood-bye, Patrick, I have to go.

result.eng: He took the car and went.
result.ga: Thóg sé an carr agus d'imigh leis
result.orig: Thóg sé an carr agus d'imigh leis
result.html: Thóg sé an carr agus d'imigh leisHe took the car and went.
result.ponchtml: Ṫóg sé an carr agus d'imiġ leisHe took the car and went.

result.eng: Time is running out.
result.ga: Tá an t-am ag imeacht
result.orig: Tá an t-am ag imeacht
result.html: Tá an t-am ag imeachtTime is running out.
result.ponchtml: Tá an t-am ag imeaċtTime is running out.

result.eng: The train is departing.
result.ga: Tá an traein ag imeacht
result.orig: Tá an traein ag imeacht
result.html: Tá an traein ag imeachtThe train is departing.
result.ponchtml: Tá an traein ag imeaċtThe train is departing.

result.eng: I am afraid, you won't leave me?
result.ga: Tá eagla orm ní imeoidh tú uaim
result.orig: Tá eagla orm ní imeoidh tú uaim
result.html: Tá eagla orm ní imeoidh tú uaimI am afraid, you won't leave me?
result.ponchtml: Tá eagla orm ní imeoiḋ tú uaimI am afraid, you won't leave me?

result.eng: I am thinking of leaving tomorrow.
result.ga: Tá mé ag cuimhneamh ar imeacht amárach
result.orig: Tá mé ag cuimhneamh ar imeacht amárach
result.html: Tá mé ag cuimhneamh ar imeacht amárachI am thinking of leaving tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag cuiṁneaṁ ar imeaċt amáraċI am thinking of leaving tomorrow.

result.eng: It is time for me to leave.
result.ga: Tá sé in am dom imeacht
result.orig: Tá sé in am dom imeacht
result.html: Tá sé in am dom imeachtIt is time for me to leave.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé in am dom imeaċtIt is time for me to leave.

result.eng: I am leaving to go watch the football match now, bye.
result.ga: Beidh mise ag imeacht le dul ag féachaint ar an gcluiche peile anois slán agaibh
result.orig: Beidh mise ag imeacht le dul ag féachaint ar an gcluiche peile anois slán agaibh
result.html: Beidh mise ag imeacht le dul ag féachaint ar an gcluiche peile anois slán agaibhI am leaving to go watch the football match now, bye.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ mise ag imeaċt le dul ag féaċaint ar an gcluiċe peile anois slán agaiḃI am leaving to go watch the football match now, bye.

result.eng: From where does the bus go?
result.ga: Cé as a n-imíonn an bus
result.orig: Cé as a n-imíonn an bus
result.html: Cé as a n-imíonn an busFrom where does the bus go?
result.ponchtml: Cé as a n-imíonn an busFrom where does the bus go?

result.eng: What time do you go home?
result.ga: Cén t-am a n-imíonn tú abhaile
result.orig: Cén t-am a n-imíonn tú abhaile
result.html: Cén t-am a n-imíonn tú abhaileWhat time do you go home?
result.ponchtml: Cén t-am a n-imíonn tú aḃaileWhat time do you go home?

result.eng: I am keeping going, Páidín. What about yourself?
result.ga: Tá mé ag coinneáil ag imeacht a Pháidín Céard fútsa
result.orig: Tá mé ag coinneáil ag imeacht a Pháidín Céard fútsa
result.html: Tá mé ag coinneáil ag imeacht a Pháidín Céard fútsaI am keeping going, Páidín. What about yourself?
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag coinneáil ag imeaċt a Ṗáidín Céard fútsaI am keeping going, Páidín. What about yourself?

result.eng: Did you go home yet?
result.ga: Ar imigh tú abhaile fós
result.orig: Ar imigh tú abhaile fós
result.html: Ar imigh tú abhaile fósDid you go home yet?
result.ponchtml: Ar imiġ tú aḃaile fósDid you go home yet?

result.eng: What time does the airplane leave?
result.ga: Cén t-am a n-imeoidh an t-eitleán
result.orig: Cén t-am a n-imeoidh an t-eitleán
result.html: Cén t-am a n-imeoidh an t-eitleánWhat time does the airplane leave?
result.ponchtml: Cén t-am a n-imeoiḋ an t-eitleánWhat time does the airplane leave?

result.eng: It leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.
result.ga: Imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i Nua-Eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am Nua-Eabhrac ar ndóigh
result.orig: Imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i Nua-Eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am Nua-Eabhrac ar ndóigh
result.html: Imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i Nua-Eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am Nua-Eabhrac ar ndóighIt leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.
result.ponchtml: Imeoiḋ sé ag a dó a ċlog sa tráṫnóna agus beiḋ sé i Nua-Eaḃrac ṫart ar ċeaṫrú tar éis a ceaṫair am Nua-Eaḃrac ar ndóiġIt leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.

result.eng: What time will you be leaving?
result.ga: Cén uair a bheas tú ag imeacht
result.orig: Cén uair a bheas tú ag imeacht
result.html: Cén uair a bheas tú ag imeachtWhat time will you be leaving?
result.ponchtml: Cén uair a ḃeas tú ag imeaċtWhat time will you be leaving?

result.eng: I have to go, or I'll be late.
result.ga: Caithfidh mé imeacht nó beidh mé deireanach
result.orig: Caithfidh mé imeacht nó beidh mé deireanach
result.html: Caithfidh mé imeacht nó beidh mé deireanachI have to go, or I'll be late.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ mé imeaċt nó beiḋ mé deireanaċI have to go, or I'll be late.

result.eng: Hold them tight so they don't get away.
result.ga: Coinnigh greim orthu ar eagla go n-imeoidís
result.orig: Coinnigh greim orthu ar eagla go n-imeoidís
result.html: Coinnigh greim orthu ar eagla go n-imeoidísHold them tight so they don't get away.
result.ponchtml: Coinniġ greim orṫu ar eagla go n-imeoidísHold them tight so they don't get away.

result.eng: She has a talent for keeping money flowing from pocket to pocket.
result.ga: Tá de bhua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeacht ó phóca go póca
result.orig: Tá de bhua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeacht ó phóca go póca
result.html: Tá de bhua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeacht ó phóca go pócaShe has a talent for keeping money flowing from pocket to pocket.
result.ponchtml: Tá de ḃua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeaċt ó ṗóca go pócaShe has a talent for keeping money flowing from pocket to pocket.

result.eng: People will tell stories about this when it's gone.
result.ga: Beidh scéalaíocht ar an rud a bheas anseo nuair imeos sé
result.orig: Beidh scéalaíocht ar an rud a bheas anseo nuair imeos sé
result.html: Beidh scéalaíocht ar an rud a bheas anseo nuair imeos séPeople will tell stories about this when it's gone.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ scéalaíoċt ar an rud a ḃeas anseo nuair imeos séPeople will tell stories about this when it's gone.

result.eng: I hardly imagined I'd leave the way I did.
result.ga: Ba róbheag a shamhail mé go n-imeoinn mar a d'imigh mé
result.orig: Ba róbheag a shamhail mé go n-imeoinn mar a d'imigh mé
result.html: Ba róbheag a shamhail mé go n-imeoinn mar a d'imigh méI hardly imagined I'd leave the way I did.
result.ponchtml: Ba róḃeag a ẛaṁail mé go n-imeoinn mar a d'imiġ méI hardly imagined I'd leave the way I did.

result.eng: I remember well the afternoon I left.
result.ga: Is maith is cuimhin liom an tráthnóna a d'imigh mé
result.orig: Is maith is cuimhin liom an tráthnóna a d'imigh mé
result.html: Is maith is cuimhin liom an tráthnóna a d'imigh méI remember well the afternoon I left.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ is cuiṁin liom an tráṫnóna a d'imiġ méI remember well the afternoon I left.

result.eng: His departure hurt her.
result.ga: Ghoil a imeacht uirthi
result.orig: Ghoil a imeacht uirthi
result.html: Ghoil a imeacht uirthiHis departure hurt her.
result.ponchtml: Ġoil a imeaċt uirṫiHis departure hurt her.

result.eng: Train departures from Malahide station.

result.eng: I didn't attend the first event.
result.ga: Níor fhreastail mé ar an chéad imeacht
result.orig: Níor fhreastail mé ar an chéad imeacht
result.html: Níor fhreastail mé ar an chéad imeachtI didn't attend the first event.
result.ponchtml: Níor ḟreastail mé ar an ċéad imeaċtI didn't attend the first event.

result.eng: She couldn't make sense of the day's events.
result.ga: Bhí ag dul di ciall a bhaint as imeachtaí an lae
result.orig: Bhí ag dul di ciall a bhaint as imeachtaí an lae
result.html: Bhí ag dul di ciall a bhaint as imeachtaí an laeShe couldn't make sense of the day's events.
